website_summaries.verdict: Constructed to deliver comfort, the OluKai Alapa employs several components that ensure this. The removable footbed that hugs the underfoot, the mesh top that keeps the foot fresh, and the versatile style, are just some of the things that people love about this footgear. Though there were complaints about chafing, it didn’t stop others from ordering several extra pairs.
pros: A lot of reviewers enjoy wearing the OluKai Alapa for extended periods of standing or walking
This walking shoe fits perfectly, says a majority of the users
Walking during hot weather is enjoyable because of the light and airy nature of the footgear, says many shoppers
This model is quick and easy to put on and remove, which delights multiple people
Loads of consumers find the style of this trainer to be attractive
cons: Some individuals wish that the Alapa came in more color options
According to a couple of owners, the back panel dug into their Achilles and caused chafing

customer_reviews.title: Try a pair on first and make sure of the size you wear.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes! If you have worn Olukia before, you know that their sizing is different from style to style. I purchased the Olukia Alapa in my normal size. Perfect! If you are not familiar with this brand, my suggestion is to go to a brick and mortar store and simply try them on. For example, I ordered the Alapa in a 10.5. In the Ohana flip flops I have size 11 and in the Nohea Mesh I have a size 10. Try a pair, you will not be disappointed.

product_meta.title: OluKai Mens Alapa Slip-On
product_meta.description: Casual cool is effortless with the OluKai® 'Alapa sneaker. Uppers of engineered mesh with high-character, antiquated full-grain leather accents. Easy slip-on style with elastic stretch at the sides. Collapsible-back shoe features a fold-down heel counter that allows it to be worn as a slip-on or a slide. Removable single-density EVA footbed with a custom floral print. Versatile Drop-In Heel® offers both a shoe and slide functionality. Lightweight, molded EVA midsole with a non-marking Wet Grip Rubber outsole, podded and siped for added traction on wet surfaces. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 10 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: UPPER: A unique, natural two tone or solid colored mesh with high character, waterproof full-grain leather accents and elastic gore panels for a customized fit. Lined with an anti-microbial, moisture-wicking single layer textile cover.

FOOTBED: Lightweight and supportive single-density poured PU anatomical footbed with a soft, moisture-wicking, anti-microbial textile lining. Custom floral print inspired by the Hawaiian hibiscus. Removable and washable.
OUTSOLE: A compression molded EVA midsole and a non-marking, 'Wet Grip Rubber' outsole with siping for added traction on wet surfaces.
FEATURES: Our patented Drop-In Heel design offers both a shoe and slide functionality and embossed and embroidered logos.
